dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3007 IH: Federal Aviation Administration Veterans’ Preference Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California (for herself and Mr. Capuano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To apply the provisions of title 5, United States Code, related to veterans’ preference to the Federal Aviation Administration personnel management system, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Aviation Administration Veterans’ Preference Protection Act.

section.header: Application of veterans’ preference to Federal Aviation Administration personnel management system
section.text: Section 40122(g)(2)(B) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—
